channel.title: Understory - language services • ecological design • theatre arts • education
channel.description: Understory provides resources and services for communications and ecological design. We promote sensible, human-scale development in the Americas - for the 21st century and beyond.

item.title: ENGLISH-SPANISH SUSTAINABLE AGRICULTURE DICTIONARY

Spanish and English Terms for Ecology, Agriculture and Building

160-page pocket dictionary & reference

item.dc:creator: Reed Ellis Aubin

item.title: SPONSORS PUT FIELD GLOSARY IN THE HANDS OF LATIN AMERICAN LEARNERS
item.description:
Understory offers supporters the opportunity to directly support our work in Latin America by sponsoring copies of the Field Glossary to be delivered to sustainable agriculture practitioners South of the Rio Grande, who otherwise wouldn't be able to access this Language-learning tool. It's a chance to efficiently distribute a valuable educational resource to some needy folks, supporting the work of Understory in the process. For a limited time, $9.00 per copy will get these books distributed.

read more
item.dc:creator: Reed Ellis Aubin
